name: Volcanic Dragon
text: If you control a face-up "Volcanic" monster, you can Special Summon this card from your hand. If this card is Summoned: Inflict 800 damage to your opponent. If this card is sent to the GY: You can set 1 "Blaze Accelerator" card directly from your Deck to your Spell & Trap zone. You can only use each effect of "Volcanic Dragon" once per turn.
